ai-mil3.2.5:1.2_0: “Reverend Sir, when you’re happy there, doing what’s skillful or unskillful?”
ai-mil3.2.5:1.3_0: “Great king, there may be unskillful, and unwholesome.”
ai-mil3.2.5:1.4_0: “Sir, if skillful qualities aren’t skillful or unskillful, or skillful?”
ai-mil3.2.5:1.5_0: “What do you think, great king, when Hatthaka doesn’t store it in the shade of the Himalayas, where would they store it in the second dust?”
ai-mil3.2.5:1.7_0: “Great king, why are these two hots?”
ai-mil3.2.5:1.9_0: “But great king, why are these both cools?”
ai-mil3.2.5:1.11_0: “If he burns without leaves or lies down, the fire burns up, and both do not arise,
ai-mil3.2.5:1.12_0: whether cold or cooling can be put into a cool breeze.
ai-mil3.2.5:1.13_0: while they are burning on both sides, both cold and heat, are not able to bother them.
ai-mil3.2.5:1.14_0: or both of them one hot and cold and heat?”
ai-mil3.2.5:1.15_0: “I’m not able to talk together with you, converse with you.”
ai-mil3.2.5:1.16_0: The senior monk who was conceived in the teaching,
ai-mil3.2.5:2.1_0: “Great king, these six kinds of lay happiness and six kinds of renunciate happiness. ... six kinds of lay happiness and six kinds of renunciate sadness. There are these six kinds of renunciate equanimity and six kinds of renunciate equanimity. These are the six kinds of feeling in the present life.”
